channels.name: All
channels.title: Search through Videos from selected Microsoft Sites
channels.description: We search through the audio, not just text. Search through the sound tracks of over 20,000 videos on this site from different sources. Click on search-result text snippets to navigate directly to keyword matches in the video. Select the source content from the tabs and type a query into the search box above, or try one of these example queries:

channels.name: Build 2011
channels.description: BUILD is a new event that shows modern hardware and software developers how to take advantage of the future of Windows. Learn how to work with all the new touch-centric user experience to create fast, fluid, and dynamic applications that leverage the power and flexibility of Windows, used by more than a billion people around the world.
